Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server extends Object
Server class, handling first client connection, lobby functionality, matches creation and unexpected client disconnection

    • startServer

      public void startServer() throws IOException
      Starts Server on specified port, begin to accept client connections
      Throws:
      IOException - if server can't accept the client

    • enqueuePlayer

      public void enqueuePlayer(ConnectionHandler connectionHandler)
      Enqueues each client connection after it received the nickname, check if nickname is valid and then add it to the queue
      Parameters:
      connectionHandler - ConnectionHandler of the client who has set nickname
      See Also:
      • ConnectionHandler

    • lobby

      private void lobby()
      Handles different client and put it in a lobby, ready to start the game

    • isNicknameValid

      private boolean isNicknameValid(ConnectionHandler connectionHandler)
      Checks whether the nickname is valid
      Parameters:
      connectionHandler - ConnectionHandler to the client which has set a nickname
      Returns:
      true if the nickname is valid, false otherwise

    • firstPlayerSetup

      public void firstPlayerSetup(int num, int completeRule) throws WrongSetupException
      Sets game with first player's preferences
      Parameters:
      num - number of players for the game
      completeRule - true if the game has complete rules, false otherwise
      Throws:
      WrongSetupException - if the number of players is not allowed

    • endGame

      protected void endGame(ConnectionHandler connectionHandler)
      Closes the connection for client who has finished the match
      Parameters:
      connectionHandler - ConnectionHandler of the client who has finished the match

      protected void unexpectedDisconnection(ConnectionHandler connectionHandler)
      Closes the connection for client who has unexpectedly disconnected and every other clients in the same lobby or match
      Parameters:
      connectionHandler - ConnectionHandler of the client who has unexpectedly disconnected

      private void stopConnection(ConnectionHandler connectionHandler)

      Parameters:
